body:
Comment 1: 
Just to double-check, I have built a hello.exe on my Mac,
which is guaranteed not to have any Windows viruses 
running on it.  Could you please see if Sophos doesn't
like this binary?
_Owner changed to **r...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._ Attachments: 1. hello.zip (34736 bytes)
